name: rabatten
description: Start med at vælge de sider du får rabat gennem. Herefter ser du en besked i toppen af hjemmesiderne med info omkring gældende rabat på netop denne hjemmeside.

scripts.npm:reinstall: npm uninstall --no-save && npm cache verify && npm install --no-optional && npm install rewire -O
scripts.lint: standard --fix src/**.js && standard --verbose src/**.js && cleancss --format beautify src/style.css -o src/style.css
scripts.uglify:background: mkdirp build && terser src/background.js -m -c drop_console  -o build/background.js
scripts.uglify:common: mkdirp build && terser src/common.js -m -c drop_console -o build/common.js
scripts.uglify:content: mkdirp build && terser src/content.js -m -c drop_console  -o build/content.js
scripts.uglify:options: mkdirp build && terser src/options.js -m -c drop_console  -o build/options.js
scripts.uglify:popup: mkdirp build && terser src/popup.js -m -c drop_console  -o build/popup.js
scripts.uglify:all: npm run uglify:background && npm run uglify:common && npm run uglify:content && npm run uglify:options && npm run uglify:popup && npm run uglify:css
scripts.build: rimraf build/ && npm run utils:version && npm run copy:all && npm run uglify:all
